summary: "How I Met Your Mother" (HIMYM) is an American comedy show that aired from 2005 to 2014. It's about Ted Mosby telling his kids how he met their mother, through stories about him and his friends in New York City. The show was made by Craig Thomas and Carter Bays, who got the idea from their own friendship. It's famous for its funny stories, dramatic moments, and unique way of telling them. HIMYM got good reviews and won many awards.
title: How I Met Your Mother
